ai-tika-s0401t11:322_1: Ten, in accordance with the Dhamma, he rapes a desire to see the Teacher, since he resides in the presence of the Teacher, he listens to the Dhamma, much although he does not allow them to hear the Dhamma,
ai-tika-s0401t11:322_2: Inspiring confidence in those without it,
ai-tika-s0401t11:323_0: The Book of the Sevens is finished.
ai-tika-s0401t11:324_0: The female lay followers of Laṅkā is finished.
ai-tika-s0401t11:326_0: Discussion of the proper conduct in regard to Uttara
ai-tika-s0401t11:327_0: The bestowed of the colour of the kasiṇa
